behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac
behavior.chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str

dump: alias sbcmd if ($sock(sockbot).status == active && $1) { sockwrite -tn sockbot $1- }
if ($1 == .uptime) { sbcmd NOTICE %nick :Uptime mIRC: $uptime(mirc,2) - Uptime System: $uptime(system,2) }
